attributes.action: Goverment To Pledge Zero Tolerence On Illegal Immigration In To The UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Every British Citizen is entitled to demand the Government imposes the Law without exception. 
Illegal Immigration devalues, hardworking, legal immigrants, a major cause of crime, and exploits the welfare system.
The Prime Minister should make a public commitment, and target, at least a 50% reduction by the end of 2008.
